name: underpants
description: The first thing you put on the morning, a uxdev-oriented seed with the bleeding edge tech and a component based mindset

scripts.uglify: uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefix
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && npm run uglify
scripts.build:images: npm run imagemin && npm run icons
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images && npm run build:html
scripts.watch:all: concurrently --kill-others "npm run serve" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:html"

author: Franco Arza
